---
title: Administration Portal
subtitle: CHoRUS Azure Data Enclave
---

The CHoRUS Administrator Portal currently offers a small collection of tools and services.

- Check **[Ares](/ares/)** to characterize data and assess data quality.
- Visit **[Prefect](/prefect/)** to orchestrate ingestion, merging, and Ares processes.
- Open **[Jupyter Lab](/lab/)** to write code in Python, and R.
